article_title: Opting Out Of The Obamacare Tax

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: This tax season, will you have to dip into your wallet for the shared individual responsibility payment for not having health care insurance? About 2-4 million taxpayers may have to pay the penalty. But if you don't pay, what's the worst that could happen?
og.title: Opting Out Of The Obamacare Tax: What Happens If You Don't Pay?
